participant_1.background:
I like to think about what it would be like to be an artist.
I enjoy writing for long periods of time.
I wish i made more money.
I have a strange obsession with pens.

participant_2.background:
I live in vienna , austria now.
I was born in london.
I paint in my free time.
I work in it.
I live with my boyfriend of 5 years.

content.text: I have always been fascinated by the thought of being an artist. I love the idea of being able to create something beautiful and unique.
That's great! I'm an artist myself. I paint in my free time and I also work in the art industry.
Wow, that's awesome! What kind of art do you create?
I mostly paint landscapes, but I also do some portraits and abstract paintings.
That sounds really cool. I love landscapes. I've always wanted to learn how to paint.
You should definitely give it a try! It's a lot of fun and it's a great way to express yourself.
I think I will. Thanks for the encouragement!
No problem! I'm always happy to talk about art.
Me too! It's such a fascinating subject.
I know, right? There's so much to learn about it.
I'm really interested in the history of art. I think it's amazing how art has changed and evolved over time.
Me too! It's incredible to see how different cultures have expressed themselves through art.
I know, right? It's such a powerful medium.
I'm so glad I met you. You're really interesting to talk to.
Thank you! I'm glad I met you too.
